H0.text: N’Djamena is the capital city of which landlocked country in central Africa. Cameroon

H1.text: N’Djamena is the capital city of which landlocked country in central Africa. Central African Republic

H2.text: N’Djamena is the capital city of which landlocked country in central Africa. Republic of the Congo

H3.text: N’Djamena is the capital city of which landlocked country in central Africa. تشاد

A4.text: Chad has a population of 19 million, of which 1.6 million live in the capital and largest city of N'Djamena.

A5.text: Chad's capital is 1,060 kilometres (660 mi) from the nearest seaport, Douala, Cameroon.
